repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.title: ENH Suppress warnings related to scipy.fftpack

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body:
Specifically, a FutureWarning is emitted during each `fft2` call,
so we wrap it with a `warnings.simplefilter` to suppress the
warning. Partially addresses #108.

body:
Seems excellent.

Please close when 3D is added.

issue.title: [DOC] solving Sphinx issues

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body:
W.r.t.:
Issues: #97  #110 #135 #105 #106 #108 #111 
PR: #144

We must find a way to remove the list of "ignore-patterns" here:

https://github.com/eickenberg/kymatio/blob/master/doc/source/conf.py#L61 

At the moment we do this, and that the sphinx works, then we will be good with the gallery!
